name: Marblism
tagline: AI Employees to scale your business
description: Youâ€™re probably wearing too many hats: CEO, marketer, salesperson, accountant, and customer service all in oneâ€¦ Meet Marblism, your AI Employees team to run your inbox, socials, lead generation, SEO, calls and support.

name: KomikoAI Video to Video
tagline: Make your videos pop with anime, cyborg, fire styles & more
description: KomikoAI Video-to-Video transforms your videos into stunning new styles â€” from anime to retro game, fire to Naruto cosplay, and more! Choose from over 80 creative templates or customize your own with prompts. Go viral on social media in just a few clicks!

name: HiveMind
tagline: Skill-based hiring on autopilot
description: Input: a stack of applicants. Output: vetted candidates, ranked by signal.

name: Macrowave
tagline: Turn Your Mac into a private radio station
description: Macrowave lets you instantly turn any Mac audio into a private, real-time stream. Share a link, broadcast peer-to-peer with no tracking, and listen on iPhone, Mac, or web. Enjoy minimal delay and perfect sync for music, co-working, or shared experiences.

name: apiJuice
tagline: Create a hosted API for anything in seconds
description: Create an API for anything in seconds. Get super fast response just paste any URL and describe the data you need in plain English. --> AI instantly creates a custom API that extracts exactly what you need. Get clean JSON data via API, n8n node, or custom app.

name: Dreambase.ai
tagline: Fully integrated analytics from Supabase. Free to use.
description: Dreambase sits directly on top of Supabase, providing immediate, fully integrated analytics. Create product reports and dashboards directly from your Supabase data in seconds, no third party libraries or tools required! Get started for FREE ðŸ˜„

name: Eternal AI
tagline: Uncensored peer-to-peer AI app
description: AI agents that do the work for you: website prototype, coding, image gen, and more. Completely uncensored, no login required, and free to use.

name: Stratify AI
tagline: Get user feedback in hours, not weeks
description: Automate your user research with AI-powered insights. Get deeper customer understanding without the manual work.

name: Qwen Chat
tagline: Qwen Chat Now Reads Web Pages
description: Qwen Chat can now directly read and process the content of any web page when you simply paste a link into the chat.

name: Air MCP
tagline: Tool For All AI Integrations, let AI use your apps
description: Universal Tool For All AI Integrations, AirMCP allows your AI to connect to real world apps without any development overhead. Key Features: Centralized Connection Management User and Data Management Easy to use config MCP assistant

name: First Answer
tagline: Monitor & improve your AI presence
description: Track your AI brand visibility in ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity and more. See how you rank in AI search, benchmark against competitors, and apply GEO insights to boost visibility.

name: Autobound for Clay & n8n
tagline: The insight engine for your GTM workflows
description: Autobound's new integrations for Clay and n8n connect the market's most powerful enrichment and automation platforms to our AI Insight Engine. Programmatically turn 300+ real-time insights into mass outreach without writing a single line of code.

name: NeuralAgent
tagline: The AI Computer Interface
description: NeuralAgent lives on your desktop and takes action like a human, it clicks, types, scrolls, and navigates your apps to complete real tasks. Just tell NeuralAgent what you want and watch the magic.

name: SongBoard
tagline: DJ Event Planning Portal
description: SongBoard is an event planning portal for DJs to collect song requests, gather event details, and prepare for events. DJs get structured playlists that sync directly with Serato, VirtualDJ, and other DJ software.

name: SciMaster
tagline: Your scientist friend, accelerating every step of research
description: SciMaster is a scientific AI agent for deep research. It excels as a PhD-level research assistant for scientists, a knowledge guide for starters, an insightful partner for analysts, and a future-ready platform for autonomous scientific discovery.

name: YT-Engage
tagline: Generate thoughtful, relevant Youtube comments instantly
description: YT-engage helps creators, brands, and marketers grow their YouTube presence by making it easier to reply to comments at scale. Instead of spending hours sorting through endless comment sections, you can quickly manage replies and keep your audience engaged.

name: SpotRank
tagline: Is Your Brand Showing Up in AI Answers?
description: spotrank.ai reveals how your brand appears in AI answers. Get powerful AEO insights to track mentions, benchmark competitors, and optimize visibility across top AI models - helping marketing teams win in the new era where AI, not search, drives discovery.

name: DomainHunt.com
tagline: Sell or get leads for your domains for only 8% commission
description: List, sell or get leads for your domains for 8%. * List domains in front of buyers and investors. * Get leads, sell or negotiate even after the listing ends. * Get domains transferred and payouts at domainhunt.com. Have success with the domains and payouts.

name: TKNIQ
tagline: Input token name, get a research report.
description: AI-powered token research platform. Paste a token name, whitepaper, or address and get a clean, structured research brief in seconds. DYOR without the grind.
